result.extracted_content:
Query: Find any search functionality, doctor directory, or specialty filters available on this page
 Result:
Search / Directory / Filter Features Found
------------------------------------------------
1. Doctor Directory  
   • “Featured Doctors” section lists individual doctors with photos, names, specialties (e.g., DERMATOLOGIST, CARDIOLOGIST, NEUROLOGY, PEDIATRICIAN, PHYSIOTHERAPY) and years of experience.  
   • Link: [VIEW ALL DOCTORS](/doctor/doctorAppointment) – takes users to the full doctor listing/appointment page.

2. Hospital Directory  
   • “Nearby Hospitals” section displays nearby hospitals with photos, names, ratings and quick-action buttons (Direction, Save, Call).  
   • Link: [VIEW ALL HOSPITALS](/hospitals/visitHospitals) – leads to the complete hospital directory.

3. Specialty Filters (implied)  
   • Each doctor card explicitly lists a specialty (DERMATOLOGIST, CARDIOLOGIST, etc.), indicating that users can filter or at least identify doctors by specialty when browsing the directory.

4. Search / Booking Entry Points  
   • Multiple “Book Appointment” buttons (all pointing to /doctor/doctorAppointment or doctor-specific sub-links) serve as the primary gateway to search for and book doctors.

write_file.content:
# Cardiologists Found on HealthBuddy.softnerve.com

## Summary
Successfully identified and extracted information for all cardiologists available on healthbuddy.softnerve.com.

## Complete List of Cardiologists

### 1. Dr. Sanjeev Bhatt (Senior)
- **Specialty:** Cardiologist
- **Qualification:** MBBS
- **Experience:** 15 Years
- **Consultations Completed:** 98
- **Available Time:** 10:00 AM – 7:00 PM
- **Location:** Raidhara, Pithoragarh, Uttarakhand

### 2. Dr. Sanjeev Bhatt (Junior)
- **Specialty:** Cardiologist
- **Qualification:** MBBS
- **Experience:** 1 Year
- **Consultations Completed:** 98
- **Available Time:** 10:00 AM – 7:00 PM
- **Location:** Raidhara, Pithoragarh, Uttarakhand

### 3. Dr. Aniket
- **Specialty:** Cardiologist
- **Qualification:** MBBS
- **Experience:** 20 Years
- **Consultations Completed:** 98
- **Available Time:** 10:00 AM – 7:00 PM
- **Location:** Ausa Road, Latur, Maharashtra

## Total Count: 3 Cardiologists Found

done.text:
**कार्डियोलॉजिस्ट डॉक्टरों की पूरी सूची - HealthBuddy.softnerve.com**

मैंने आपके लिए healthbuddy.softnerve.com पर उपलब्ध सभी कार्डियोलॉजिस्ट डॉक्टरों की जानकारी खोज ली है। वेबसाइट पर कुल 3 कार्डियोलॉजिस्ट डॉक्टर उपलब्ध हैं:

**1. डॉ. संजीव भट्ट (अनुभव: 15 वर्ष)**
- योग्यता: MBBS
- अनुभव: 15 वर्ष
- परामर्श संख्या: 98
- उपलब्ध समय: सुबह 10:00 बजे से शाम 7:00 बजे तक
- स्थान: रायधारा, पिथौरागढ़, उत्तराखंड

**2. डॉ. संजीव भट्ट (अनुभव: 1 वर्ष)**
- योग्यता: MBBS
- अनुभव: 1 वर्ष
- परामर्श संख्या: 98
- उपलब्ध समय: सुबह 10:00 बजे से शाम 7:00 बजे तक
- स्थान: रायधारा, पिथौरागढ़, उत्तराखंड

**3. डॉ. अनिकेत**
- योग्यता: MBBS
- अनुभव: 20 वर्ष
- परामर्श संख्या: 98
- उपलब्ध समय: सुबह 10:00 बजे से शाम 7:00 बजे तक
- स्थान: औसा रोड, लातूर, महाराष्ट्र

यह सभी जानकारी मैंने वेबसाइट के डॉक्टर डायरेक्टरी से कार्डियोलॉजिस्ट फिल्टर लगाकर प्राप्त की है।
